name: Cilantro Tabouli
author: robynmorgan
summary: Tasty twist on a Mediterranean classic. Serendipitous discovery when I didn't have any parsley on hand!
ingredients: 2  green onions, sliced into thin slivers
¾ cup coarsely chopped fresh cilantro
2 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan, turn off the heat, and stir in the bulgur wheat
Cover and let sit for 30 minutes to absorb water
Strain off any liquid left unabsorbed, if necessary
Place the bulgur wheat in a large salad bowl, and lightly toss with the tomatoes, green onions, cilantro, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, pepper, and salt until thoroughly combined
Refrigerate the salad for at least 3 hours to blend the flavors; serve cold
